name: Matcha
description: Powdered green tea, used in tea ceremonies and various desserts such as matcha ice cream or matcha mochi.

name: Ramen
description: A soup with wheat noodles, often with meat (pork, chicken, or beef), seaweed, egg, and vegetables.

name: Sushi
description: Bites of rice topped with various ingredients, such as raw fish, crab, avocado, or dried seaweed.
